Title: Relates to mutual companies in N.Y. city
Summary: Requires a Mitchell-Lama cooperative seeking to dissolve to offer cooperators who may not be able to afford the increased carrying charges the opportunity to sell.
LawCode: Amd ยง35, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to mutual companies in a city with a population of one million or more
